member.name: DML_CAST_OPERATOR_DESC
member.summary: Casts each element in the input to the data type of the output tensor, and stores the result in the corresponding element of the output.

member.name: DML_CAST_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The tensor to write the results to. This tensor's Sizes should match InputTensor.

member.name: DML_CAST_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: A pointer to a constant containing the description of the tensor to write the results to.
